UPDATE - Tesla Announces Date for Third Quarter 2018 Financial Results and Webcast | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back UPDATE - Tesla Announces Date for Third Quarter 2018 Financial Results and Webcast Globe Newswire Oct 22, 2018 PALO ALTO, Calif., Oct. 22, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- UPDATE: At the request of a number of analysts, we are moving the call by one hour to 3:30pm Pacific Time (6:30pm Eastern Time). Tesla will post its financial results for the third quarter of 2018 after market close on Wednesday, October 24, 2018. &nbsp;At that time, Tesla will issue a brief advisory containing a link to the Q3 2018 Update Letter, which will be available on Tesla’s Investor Relations website.&nbsp; Tesla will hold a live question and answer webcast that day at 3:30pm Pacific Time (6:30pm Eastern Time) to discuss the Company’s financial and business results and outlook. What:&nbsp; Date of Tesla Q3 2018 Financial Results and Q&amp;A Webcast &nbsp; When: Wednesday, October 24, 2018 &nbsp; Time: 3:30pm Pacific Time / 6:30pm Eastern Time &nbsp; Shareholder Letter: http://ir.tesla.com &nbsp; Webcast:&nbsp; http://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) &nbsp; Approximately two hours after the Q&amp;A session, an archived version of the webcast will be available on the Company’s website. For additional information, please visit ir.tesla.com . Footer Tesla © 2026 Subscription Preferences Contact &amp; FAQ Privacy &amp; Legal
